short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enables translation by capturing images on web pages.
short.zh_TW: 透過在網頁上進行「框選」，以AI文字偵測擷取網頁內容，提供翻譯結果。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension utilizes webpage screenshots and AI text detection technology to extract text from any webpage and provide instant translation. This enables users to easily comprehend and learn knowledge from around the globe, breaking through language barriers. With no restrictions, simply install the extension to enjoy the convenience.
long.zh_TW: 這個 Chrome 擴充功能利用網頁截圖和AI文字偵測技術，從任何網頁部件(文字、圖片、影片)提取文字並提供即時翻譯。幫助輕鬆理解並學習來自全球的知識，突破語言障礙。沒有任何限制，只需安裝擴展即可享受便利。
